meanings.definition: A salt or ester of hypochlorous acid.
meanings.sent1: I used hypochlorites to clean the pool.
meanings.sent2: The hypochlorites in the solution helped disinfect the water.
meanings.sent3: The hypochlorites decided to throw a party in the chlorine bottle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as hypochlorites on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hypochlorites lingered in the air after cleaning.

meanings.sent1: The lab technician handled the hypochlorites with care.
meanings.sent2: Hypochlorites are commonly used in bleach products.
meanings.sent3: The hypochlorites in the beaker started a tiny dance party.
meanings.sent4: His words were like hypochlorites, cleansing the situation.
meanings.sent5: The bright color of hypochlorites stood out in the chemical mixture.
